articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Making sense of the risky Netflix-Warner Bros. deal - TechCrunch
articles.description: Netflix's $82.6 billion acquisition of Warner Bros. encapsulates a fraught moment for Hollywood, as the entertainment business is increasingly overshadowed by tech giants.
articles.content: Whether or not Netflixs $82.6 billion acquisition of Warner Bros. goes through, the deal encapsulates a fraught moment for Hollywood, as the entertainment business is increasingly overshadowed by tec… [+4761 chars]
